name: Block Games
description:
3 simple block games designed to be played for 10 seconds each.

Block Drop - Click the green blocks to gain 10 points and avoid the red blocks because you will lose 5 points.

Mexican Wave - Click the block which starts off as white in when it is yellow to turn it green. To get a higher score you must click and hold it, in sync with the other blocks.

Ball Bounce - Click and drag on the ball to fling it into one of the scoring pots. Red = 25, Yellow = 50, Green = 100.
